title: App fails on non-SSE compatible processor with GO386=387 specified.
body:
by **krolaw**: 
Go version 1.1beta2

Example code: http://play.golang.org/p/bI351EVMik
Compilation Machine: Mac running 10.8.3
Compiled using: GO386=387 GOOS=linux GOARCH=386 go build boom.go

# ./boom
SIGILL: illegal instruction
PC=0x8072abd

math.initÂ·1()
	/usr/local/go/src/pkg/math/pow10.go:34 +0x1d
math.init()
	/usr/local/go/src/pkg/math/unsafe.go:21 +0x3c
main.init()
	/Users/krolaw/Dropbox/engine/src/tm/boom.go:0 +0x3c

goroutine 2 [runnable]:
eax     0x0
ebx     0x81264e0
ecx     0x1821f120
edx     0x18228000
edi     0xb736efdc
esi     0x80
ebp     0x18228000
esp     0xb735ffb8
eip     0x8072abd
eflags  0x10206
cs      0x73
fs      0x0
gs      0x3f

------
Rob wanted output of 8l

export GO386=387
export GOOS=linux
export GOARCH=386

/usr/local/go/pkg/tool/darwin_amd64/8l -a boom.8 | gzip -9 > boom.8l-a.gz

File attached.

Thanks.
Attachments: 1. boom.8l-a.gz (1334477 bytes)
